item.title: North Carolina governor signs 'Iryna's Law' after Ukrainian refugee's brutal train murder
item.description: Gov. Josh Stein signed legislation Friday requiring stricter bail evaluations following the train stabbing death of Iryna Zarutska by repeat offender.
